name: Food Chainz
description:
Features
* 3 radical rap battles
* 5 original beats
* You can quite literally roast a fish in a rap battle
* Unless you lose, the fish eats you then

Controls

* WASD or arrow keys to move and rap
* Space to interact with characters, and progress dialogue
* Close the game to quit

Content warnings
* Game should be suitable for minors
* *Implied cartoon violence* (screen jumps to black, an eating noise is heard, and when the screen returns an opponent is no longer there). This can happen to the human main character, a dog, a fish, or a cloaked figure.

Other than that, there is no physical aggression, bad language, or sensitive topics covered in the lyrics.

If you find anything in the game you would deem needing of a warning, please let me know and I'll add it!

Accessibility
As a rhythm game, the challenge faced will vary greatly depending on the user. The game is designed to give a sense of challenge to all but experienced rhythm game players, but still be fully beatable by most.

Difficulty setting is on the roadmap for the post-jam version, but in the meantime if you find the game too challenging and want an easier version, please let me know and I'll send you a tailored build.

Please let me know if you have any thoughts, issues, or just nice things to say!
Mac and Linux builds not currently tested, please let me know if they worked for you.

Made for Ludum Dare 43

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/food-chainz/
